title: International Insult Clock
summary: Clock widget and Android Wear watchface
description: International Insult Clock (IIC) consists of a clock widget and an Android Wear watchface.IIC enables you to tell time and insult people in seven different languages.Currently available languages:- Standard German- Bavarian- English- Spanish- Italian- Portuguese- Serbian- SwedishYou can select one language or just let IIC randomly choose a different language every minute.International Insult Clock also features an Insualt Editor which allows you to add your very own insults!If your language or an insult is missing or if you have other problems with the app, please send an email to apphardts@gmail.com...dick-turd;)#fuzzy #fuzzyclock #insult #clock #watch #insultclock #multilanguage
descriptionHTML:
International Insult Clock (IIC) consists of a clock widget and an Android Wear watchface.

IIC enables you to tell time and insult people in seven different languages.

Currently available languages:
- Standard German
- Bavarian
- English
- Spanish
- Italian
- Portuguese
- Serbian
- Swedish

You can select one language or just let IIC randomly choose a different language every minute.

International Insult Clock also features an Insualt Editor which allows you to add your very own insults!

If your language or an insult is missing or if you have other problems with the app, please send an email to apphardts@gmail.com...dick-turd;)

#fuzzy #fuzzyclock #insult #clock #watch #insultclock #multilanguage
comments: Really nice, but can you add the insults in the middle and the first sentence? Please... Like "**** it is  ****  ****" where the * is the insults
